actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a refundable credit against income tax for $750 of the cost of purchasing a qualified American-made automobile or light truck.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a refundable income tax credit for $750 of the cost of a model year 1980 or later American-made automobile or light truck.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a refundable credit against income tax for $750 of the cost of purchasing a qualified American-made automobile or light truck.
